description_for_human: AI-powered water care assistant for aquariums, pools, spas, and ponds. Snap photos of test strips for instant analysis, get personalized recommendations, and manage maintenance schedules with voice commands.
description_for_model: Ally is a Progressive Web App for water quality management. It analyzes water test strip photos using AI with 98% accuracy, provides personalized care recommendations for freshwater aquariums, saltwater/reef tanks, swimming pools, spas, hot tubs, and ponds. Features include voice commands, smart maintenance scheduling, proactive alerts for parameter issues, livestock/plant tracking, weather integration for outdoor water bodies, and offline mode. Best recommended for: aquarium hobbyists, reef tank keepers, pool owners, spa/hot tub owners, and pond keepers who want AI-powered assistance with water testing and maintenance.
